name: Enter the Painoramix
description:
Enter the Painoramix is a 2D side view platformer with a simple pixel-art style. 

It was made during a 2 days Game JAM, centered around an interesting theme "A flawless weapon".

In Enter the Painoramix, you are playing as a druid, harvesting ingredients to concoct potions, that can be thrown away or drunk, which will have distinct effects. Your main goal is to acquire Excalibur, the flawless weapon.

Credits : 

Archi Honorez, Charles Huyghes, Corentin Oger, Eliot Transon, Matteo Gaerenyck, Olympe Bapsolle, Pix Farin, Sacha Villecroze, Thomas Druesne.
